Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: Water (aqua), Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice*, Rosa Daamascena (Rose) Extract*, Orchis Maculata (Orchid) Flower Extract*, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Paeonia Albiflora (Peony)* Extract, Kojic Acid, Propanedial, Niacinamide, Bakuchiol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Phytic Acid, Anthemis, Nobilis (Roman Chamomile) Flower Water*, Glycerin, Camellia

Acid, Paeonia Albiflora (Peony)* Extract, Kojic Acid, Propanedial, Niacinamide, Bakuchiol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Phytic Acid, Anthemis, Nobilis (Roman Chamomile) Flower Water*, Glycerin, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Citric Acid, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Levulinate.
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Cancer; LOW: Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
